feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts

entry.title: My community is hurting.
entry.content:
Post 195325 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This is so awful, but Metafilter isn't really for personal posts / fundraising. Please contact us if you'd like to discuss! -- taz
